page.title: 09Working in Maple Cross
page.content: Working in Maple Cross can be very convenient,especially for the part time mum. My mum works in Maple Cross her feelings are:if anything should go wrong at school,she could be there within a 10 minute walk ,which would mean no travelling expenses i.e no bus fares, no train tickets and no petrol expenses, just the use of your legs and feet. My mum works at Cementation, she is a typist.Several parents who have children at our school,work in Maple Cross i.e there are shops in Maple Cross and two pubs,where you could get a job and also an industrial estate. The people in Maple Cross are very friendly.I use the shops nearly every day.There is a food shop,a newsagents and a hairdressers.Things such as crisps and biscuits can be expensive.
